title: Calibration and Instrumentation Engineer
summary: The Hardware Test Engineering team plays a key role in keeping up quality standards, and through work with the team, you’ll have the outstanding opportunity to impact products all across Apple.
description: You will be responsible for the specification, design, validation and deployment of automated equipment to test and calibrate devices for Apple’s new product introduction (NPI) and mass production. Responsibilities will be tuned to match the candidate’s technical background.
key_qualifications: 3+ years of professional experience with at least 1 year in the relevant sensing Industry with sensor/system integration focus. Experience in working with non-imaging optics like proximity sensors, ambient light sensors, lasers. Knowledge of EE fundamentals, and experience with light measurement (Photometry, Spectroradiometers) and thermal or electrical health sensing measurements.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is between $143,100 and $264,200. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs.
